name: Do you speak Pulaar
description: Do you speak Pulaar is a book written by Mr. Aboou Sy. This book has been turned into a mobile application by a young programmer Kane Hamath Moussa.  You will discover in this application basic concepts to learn well Pulaar. Do you speak Pulaar is a book written by Mr. Aboou Sy. This book has been turned into a mobile application by a young programmer Kane Hamath Moussa.  You will discover in this application basic concepts to learn Pulaar.
